remarks: Equality of functions is determined by their values.  Special case of Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28 (with domain equality omitted). (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
eqfnfv $p |- ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn A ) -> ( F = G <-> A. x e. A ( F ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
